name: Super Hero Fight Club: Reloaded
description:
Play with friends or AI bots in this epic fast-paced game, where skill and reflex are everything. Join roster of uniqe heroes with original weapons and mechanics.
Wide range of weapons include sword, shotgun, laser, batarang, bow and many more - find Your favourite.
Single player missions, ladder and survival allow you to practise with every hero, so when time for deathmatch or team deathmatch with friends will come, You'll be ready to become numer one.

Key features:
- High-profile pixel art
- 45 single palyer missions - Test each hero in different scenarios
- 17 heroes - Unique features of the super heroes make each brawl a new adventure
- 61 maps - You're fighting not only with your weakness and enemys. Additional dangers awaits with each arena

Game Modes:
- Single player missions
- Ladder
- Survival
- Deatchmatch (1-4 local players)
- Team DeathMatch (1-4 local players)


Game require controller!
